text: T-ara is a four-member South Korean girl group formed in 2009. They are one of the best-selling girl groups of all time. This is a list of their awards and nominations. == Awards and nominations == ===Asia Artist Awards=== |- | 2016 |rowspan= "2"| T-ara | Most Popular Artist (Singer) | |- | 2017 | Most Popular Artist (Singer) | ===Asia Jewelry Awards=== |- | 2011 | T-ara | Diamond Award | ===Billboard Japan Music Awards=== |- | 2012 | T-ara | Top Pop Artist of 2011 | ===Cyworld Digital Music Awards=== |- | rowspan="3"| 2009 | "Lies" | Rookie of the Month - August 싸이BGM - Boys & Girls love Music . 싸이BGM - Boys & Girls love Music.
